command_line: export BCFTOOLS_PLUGINS=`which bcftools | sed 's,bin/bcftools,libexec/bcftools,'`;     bgzip -c '/galaxy/server/database/objects/f/a/5/dataset_fa59f664-df23-4908-aaf7-f692ce55573a.dat' > input.vcf.gz && bcftools index input.vcf.gz &&            bcftools view     --samples 'NA00002'     --min-ac 1 --max-ac 1 --types "snps"                     --output-type 'v'   --threads ${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4}    input.vcf.gz  > '/galaxy/server/database/objects/4/d/b/dataset_4dba0c87-c8c2-4a8a-8747-e5f9ea5a7dac.dat'
